mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grade (enrollment_id, score, grade) VALUES (#{enrollmentId}, #{score}, #{grade})
mapper.select: SELECT c.name AS courseName, ROUND(AVG(g.score), 1) AS averageScore, SUM(CASE WHEN g.score BETWEEN 0 AND 59 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS range0to59, SUM(CASE WHEN g.score BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS range60to69, SUM(CASE WHEN g.score BETWEEN 70 AND 79 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS range70to79, SUM(CASE WHEN g.score BETWEEN 80 AND 89 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS range80to89, SUM(CASE WHEN g.score BETWEEN 90 AND 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS range90to100 FROM grade g JOIN course c ON g.course_id = c.id GROUP BY g.course_id
